mapper.select: SELECT A.USER_ID, A.USER_PWD, A.USER_NAME, A.EMAIL, A.PHONE, A.ADDRESS, A.INTRO, A.CREATE_DATE, A.CREATE_USER, A.DELETE_DATE, A.DELETE_USER, A.USER_PHOTO, IFNULL(B.GROUP_IDX,'')+'-'+IFNULL(B.FILE_IDX,'')+'.'+IFNULL(B.EXTENSION,'') AS PHOTO_NAME, 'FALSE' AS UPDATE_FLAG, NOW() AS LOGIN_TIME FROM USER A LEFT JOIN FILE_MASTER B ON (B.GROUP_IDX='1' AND A.USER_PHOTO = B.FILE_IDX ) WHERE A.USER_ID = #{USER_ID} AND IFNULL(A.DEL_YN, 'N') = 'N'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO FILE_MASTER (GROUP_IDX, FILE_IDX, FILE_SIZE, STORED_NAME, ORIGINAL_NAME, EXTENSION, CREATE_USER) VALUES (#{GROUP_IDX}, #{FILE_IDX}, #{FILE_SIZE}, #{STORED_NAME}, #{ORIGINAL_NAME}, #{EXTENSION}, #{login.user_id})
mapper.select: SELECT A.GROUP_IDX, A.GROUP_NAME, B.USER_ID FROM GROUP_HEADER A, GROUP_MEMBER B WHERE A.GROUP_IDX = B.GROUP_IDX AND B.USER_ID = #{user_id} ORDER BY A.GROUP_IDX
SELECT A.USER_CNT, B.GROUP_CNT FROM (SELECT COUNT(*) USER_CNT FROM USER) A, (SELECT COUNT(*) GROUP_CNT FROM GROUP_HEADER) B
SELECT IDX, FILE_GROUP, STORED_FILE_NAME, ORIGINAL_FILE_NAME, FILE_SIZE, DEL_YN, CREATE_DATE, CREATE_USER, DELETE_DATE, DELETE_USER FROM FILE_MANAGER WHERE IFNULL(DEL_YN, 'N') = 'N' AND IDX = #{idx}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO FILE_MANAGER ( STORED_FILE_NAME, ORIGINAL_FILE_NAME, FILE_SIZE, CREATE_DATE, CREATE_USER, DEL_YN ) VALUES ( #{stored_file_name}, #{original_file_name}, #{file_size}, now(), #{user_id}, 'N' )
